creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: riverfront scene; river in foreground; traditional style buildings built up against the river; man in boat at LR; group of people crossing bridge in center, blossoming cherry tree in foreground at L and top
inscription: left: 自摺　昭和八年作　はやせ {jizuri, Shōwa hachinen saku, Hayase} | bottom, in pencil: Hayase | Hiroshi Yoshida
markings: LRC, red artist\'s seal A: 博 {Hiroshi}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Untitled series known as Kansai District
title: Hayase
